original_text: And it came to pass after this, that Absalom prepared him chariots and horses, and fifty men to run before him.
korean_text: 그 후에 압살롬이 자기를 위하여 병거와 말들을 준비하고 호위병 오십 명을 그 앞에 세우니라

sentences.original_text: And it came to pass after this
that Absalom prepared him chariots and horses
sentences.korean_translation: 압살롬이 자기를 위해 병거와 말들을 준비하였고

sentences.original_text: and fifty men to run before him
sentences.korean_translation: 그 앞에서 달릴 오십 명을 준비하였더라
